netcloak.name: NetCloak VPN
netcloak.description: Privacy-focused VPN service for mobile devices

versions.summary: Initial privacy policy. Establishes no-logs policy, minimal data collection, and age restriction (18+).
highlights: Minimal data collection (IP addresses only for security)

versions.summary: Initial Terms of Use. Establishes service rules, acceptable use policy, and legal framework for the free, ad-supported VPN service.
highlights: Free service with ad-supported model (8-second video ads)
